enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding text to an element, with prependText adding text at the beginning and appendText adding text at the end.
Both methods modify the text content of an element, though text(String) replaces the existing content entirely.
Calling empty() before prependText(String) ensures that the element is cleared of any existing content, allowing the prepended text to be the only content.
ensureChildNodes() ensures that the element has a list of child nodes, which is necessary for prependText(String) to function correctly.
